mapper.sql: id, name, price, addr, inventory, sales_volume, specifications, kind_id, Introduction_id, custom_id, banner_img, title_img, sell_way, extrafield_A, extrafield_B, extrafield_C, extrafield_D, extrafield_E, creator, modify_time
mapper.select:
SELECT g.id, g.name, g.price, g.addr, g.inventory, g.sales_volume,g.specifications, g.sell_way, k.id as kindId,k.name as kindName, i.id as introductionId,i.introduction,i.imgs, c.id as commentId,c.customer_id, c.content,c.public_time, c.score, f.id as fileId,f.name,f.path, f.size, f.Ext, f.Location FROM t_goods g LEFT JOIN t_kind2goods kg on kg.right_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_kinds k on kg.left_id=k.id
LEFT JOIN t_good2introduction gi on gi.left_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_introduction i on gi.right_id=i.id
LEFT JOIN t_good2comment gc on gc.left_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_comment c on gc.right_id=c.id
LEFT JOIN t_goods2files gf on gf.left_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_files f on gf.right_id=f.id
and g.name =${name}
order by
${orderBy} asc,
${orderBy} desc,
modify_time desc;

SELECT g.id, g.name, g.price, g.addr, g.inventory, g.sales_volume,g.specifications, g.sell_way, k.name as kindName, i.id as introductionId,i.introduction,i.imgs, c.id as commentId,c.customer_id, c.content,c.public_time, c.score, f.id as fileId,f.name,f.path, f.size, f.Ext, f.Location FROM t_goods g LEFT JOIN t_kind2goods kg on kg.right_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_kinds k on kg.left_id=k.id
LEFT JOIN t_good2introduction gi on gi.left_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_introduction i on gi.right_id=i.id
LEFT JOIN t_good2comment gc on gc.left_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_comment c on gc.right_id=c.id
LEFT JOIN t_goods2files gf on gf.left_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_files f on gf.right_id=f.id
and g.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
